Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller

Class ForgeController<E,ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,ID>>

java.lang.Object
com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller.ForgeController<E,ID,R>
Type Parameters:
E - the entity type
ID - the ID type
R - the repository type
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudController<E,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HasNameForgeController
@RestController public abstract class ForgeController<E,ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,ID>> extends Object implements CrudController<E,ID>
Abstract base implementation of CrudController that interacts directly with a JpaRepository. Used when a service layer is not requested.
